reqs: Limited seating may be available to non-MPPGA students. Please contact the program (mppga.program@ubc.ca). This course is taught in Room 351 in the C.K. Choi Building, 1855 West Mall, UBC.
description: Comprehensive and systematic assessments and analyses of political dynamics, policy behaviors, and diplomatic interactions of Asian countries. Major diplomatic issues, cross-cutting diplomatic challenges, and opportunities facing countries in the region.
